name: José Juan Piñero González
description: '''José Juan Piñero González''' (August 29, 1942 - March 14, 2018), better known as '''Pijuán''', was a Puerto Rican musician who produced and/or has been credited on several albums under the record labels Phillips Borinquen, Hit Parade, Kubaney, Discos Melón, TH Records, Private Ranch Records and Musigol Records.
